name: Farmer's Request
description: A local farmer needs help protecting his crops
Help the farmer secure his harvest and
ensure the village has enough food for winter.

dialogs.start1: Please, adventurer! I need your help!
dialogs.start2: Wild animals keep destroying my crops, and pests are eating everything!
dialogs.start3: Without a good harvest, the village will struggle through winter.
dialogs.progress1: Thank you for helping with the pests!
dialogs.progress2: My crops are looking much better already.
dialogs.complete2: The village will eat well this winter thanks to you.
